title: U.N. Representative Blames Syria's Civil War For Massive Migration Crisis
teaser: The U.N. says Europe and the West need to change immigration policies to prevent more disaster. Renee Montagne talks to Francois Crepeau, the U.N. special rapporteur on the human rights of migrants.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
